name: RunMATLABBuild
description: Run a build using the MATLAB build tool. Use this task to run the MATLAB build tasks specified in a file named buildfile.m in the root of your repository. To use the run-build task, you need MATLAB R2022b or a later release.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

inputs.name: tasks
inputs.label: Tasks
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-separated list of tasks to run. If not specified, the task runs the default tasks in the file buildfile.m as well as all the tasks on which they depend.

inputs.name: startupOptions
inputs.label: Startup Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Startup options to pass to MATLAB.

messages.BuildFailed: Build failed with nonzero exit code.
